動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍犬瘟熱、腺病毒第二型、犬小病毒、鉤端螺旋體及狂犬病混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 犬：預防犬瘟熱、犬傳染性肝炎、犬小病毒、鉤端螺旋體及狂犬病。
ingredients: TRIVIROVAX (DHP)冷凍乾燥疫苗：DISTEMPER DISEASE VIRUS, AT LEAST....10^3 CCID50CANINE ADENOVIRUS (CAV2), AT LEAST...10^2.5 CCID50CANINE PARVOVIRUS, AT LEAST..........10^3 CCID50FREEZE-DRYING EXCIPIENT, Q.S.........1 DOSELEPTORABISIN (LR)液態疫苗：INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA CANICOLA, AT LEAST...........QS. TO E.P.INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA ICTEROHAEMORAGIAE, AT LEAST..RABIES ANTIGEN,AT LEAST 1 IU   FORMALDEHYDR, AT MOST 0.12MGALUMINIUM(AS HYDROXIDE),AT MOST 0.6MG  MERTHIOLATE,AT MOST 0.1MG
